articles.description: Byju’s on Tuesday announced that Chief Financial Officer Ajay Goel has quit the company. Nitin Golani has been entrusted with additional responsibilities as India's CFO.
articles.content: Edtech firm Byju's on Tuesday announced a significant change in its leadership in the finance department. The company's Chief Financial Officer, Ajay Goel, is set to depart from his role just six mon… [+1851 chars]
